actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1084.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6711, to extend the authorization of youth training and employment programs and improve such programs, to extend the authorization of the private sector initiative program, to authorize intensive and remedial education programs for youths, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6711 (youth employment and education programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6711, to extend the authorization of youth training and employment programs and improve such programs, to extend the authorization of the private sector initiative program, to authorize intensive and remedial education programs for youths, and for other purposes.
